summary: This module centralizes the configuration handling for the JoinMarket client. It reads and parses configuration files, wraps settings in an attributeâ€‘accessible dictionary, validates and provides convenient getters for network, RPC credentials, IRC channels, fee rates, and other options. It also sets up logging, manages plugin service initialization, and offers utilities for startup and shutdown processing.
business_intent: To provide a single, reliable source of configuration data and logging setup for the JoinMarket application, enabling other components to access settings consistently and ensuring plugins and core services start with the correct parameters.
